Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Nativity:

Text.Language: Pimici e~bol qen Viwt: qajwou n~nie~wn t/rou: acmacf n~je ]ourw: ectob n~je tecparyenia.
The begotten of the Father before all ages, was born of the Queen, and her virginity was sealed.

All/louia: all/louia: all/louia. I/couc Pi,~rictoc Ps/ri m~V]: acmacf n~je ]paryenoc: qen B/yleem n~te ]Ioudea kata nic~m/ m~p~rov/tikon.
Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia. Jesus Christ the Son of God, was born of the Virgin: in Bethlehem of Judea: according to the prophetic voices.

Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Nativity:

Text.Language: Aui~ni naf n~handwron: ounoub nem oulibanoc nem ousal euerhumnoc nem p~cepi euouwst m~mof.
They presented Him gifts of gold, frankincense, and myrrh; praising with the rest, they bowed down and worshiped Him.

Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia. Jesus Christ the Son of God, was born of the Virgin: in Bethlehem of Judea: according to the prophetic voices.
